if(NOT DISABLE_3rdParty)
    set(SPDLOG_BUILD_TESTING CACHE FORCE OFF)
    set(SPDLOG_BUILD_EXAMPLES CACHE FORCE OFF)
    add_subdirectory(spdlog)

    if(ENABLE_TESTING)
        set(BUILD_GTEST ON)
        set(BUILD_GMOCK ON)
        message(STATUS ${BUILD_GMOCK})
        add_subdirectory(gtest)
        add_subdirectory(curlpp)
    endif()

else()
    message(STATUS "Disabling 3rdparty")
    find_package(GTest REQUIRED)
    find_package(GMock REQUIRED)
    find_package(CURLpp REQUIRED)
    find_package(CURL REQUIRED)

    add_library(spdlog INTERFACE)
    target_include_directories(spdlog INTERFACE ${spdlog_INCLUDE_DIR})
    add_library(curlpp INTERFACE)
    target_include_directories(curlpp INTERFACE ${CURLPP_INCLUDE_DIR})
    target_link_libraries(curlpp INTERFACE ${CURLPP_LIBRARY} ${CURL_LIBRARIES})
endif()

add_library(date INTERFACE)
target_include_directories(date INTERFACE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/date/include)

add_library(cxxopts INTERFACE)
target_include_directories(cxxopts INTERFACE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/cxxopts/include)
